game.name: The Sickle Family
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Sickle Family is a haunting adventure game about dogs, exploring how inaction, even when everything seems normal, can lead to deep trauma and heartbreak. It tells a real-life story of grief, loss, and the hidden consequences of everyday moments.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Sickle Family is a haunting adventure game about dogs, exploring how inaction, even when everything seems normal, can lead to deep trauma and heartbreak. It tells a real-life story of grief, loss, and the hidden consequences of everyday moments.
